document.full_text: to judge by their polar opposite reactions, two top u.s. federal reserve officials could have been looking at completely different sets of u.s. inflation data on friday.
document.title: fed's hoenig worried on inflation; evans not
lines_and_colors: to judge by their polar opposite reactions, two top u.s. federal reserve officials could have been looking at completely different sets of u.s. inflation data on friday.
